article.headline: Northeastern 63, Boston U. 48
article.story: BOSTON (AP) -- Marcus Barnes scored 20 points and Shawn James added 16 points and 10 rebounds as Northeastern used a late run to pull away for a 63-48 win over Boston University on Sunday. The Huskies (17-8, 13-3 America East) trailed 45-44 with 6:27 left but took a 48-45 lead on baskets by Barnes and Shawn James. Northeastern held the Terriers without a field goal for the rest of the game and hit 12 free throws down the stretch. Northeastern has won seven of its last eight games and is now tied with BU (19-6, 13-3) for second place in the conference. By sweeping the Terriers, the Huskies own the tiebreaker for the No. 2 seed in the conference tournament. BU led by as much as 19-10 in the first half before Northeastern rallied to within 23-18 by halftime. Northeastern reeled off eight points in 61 seconds to pull even at 41-41 midway through the second half, then took its first lead, 44-43, on Barnes' 3-pointer with 8:34 left. Northeastern guard Jose Juan Barea, who announced Saturday that he intends to skip his senior season and enter the NBA Draft, scored eight points on 2-of-17 field goal shooting. Rashad Bell scored 17 points and Etienne Brower added 11 points and 10 rebounds to lead the Terriers, who shot 1-of-17 from 3-point range.

statistics.name: points
statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: fieldGoals
statistics.description: Field Goal makes and attempts.

statistics.name: freeThrows
statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.name: rebounds
statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.
